  • メソッド
com.worksap.nlp.sudachi

インタフェース LatticeNode

  • 既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    LatticeNodeImpl

    public interface LatticeNode
    A node of Lattice.

    The node has the parameters of connection, the position in the input text, and the information of morpheme as WordInfo

    Allocation of a node in the plugins must be done through Lattice.createNode().

    関連項目:
    Lattice, WordInfo

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      int getBegin()
      Returns the index to the first position of the node in the input text.
      int getDictionaryId()
      Returns the ID of the dictionary ID containing the morpheme of the node.
      int getEnd()
      Returns the index to after the last position of the node in the input text.
      int getPathCost()
      Returns the cost of the path from the beginning of sentence to this node.
      int getWordId()
      Returns the ID of the morpheme.
      WordInfo getWordInfo()
      Returns the morpheme information of the node.
      boolean isOOV()
      Returns true if, and only if, the node is out of vocabulary.
      void setOOV()
      Makes the node out of vocabulary.
      void setParameter(short leftId, short rightId, short cost)
      Set the parameters of connection.
      void setRange(int begin, int end)
      Set the indexes of the node in the input text.
      void setWordInfo(WordInfo wordInfo)
      Sets the morpheme information to the node.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(short leftId,
                  short rightId,
                  short cost)
        Set the parameters of connection.
        パラメータ:
        leftId - the left-ID of connection
        rightId - the right-ID of connection
        cost - the word occurrence cost

      • getBegin

        int getBegin()
        Returns the index to the first position of the node in the input text.
        戻り値:
        the index to the first position of the node in the input text.

      • getEnd

        int getEnd()
        Returns the index to after the last position of the node in the input text. The last position of the nodes is getEnd() - 1.
        戻り値:
        the index to after the last position of the node in the input text.

      • setRange

        void setRange(int begin,
              int end)
        Set the indexes of the node in the input text. The last position of the nodes is end - 1.
        パラメータ:
        begin - the index to the first position of the node in the input text.
        end - the index to after the last position of the node in the input text.

      • isOOV

        boolean isOOV()
        Returns true if, and only if, the node is out of vocabulary.
        戻り値:
        true if the node is OOV, otherwise false

      • setOOV

        void setOOV()
        Makes the node out of vocabulary.

      • getWordInfo

        WordInfo getWordInfo()
        Returns the morpheme information of the node.
        戻り値:
        the morpheme information of the node
        関連項目:
        WordInfo

      • setWordInfo

        void setWordInfo(WordInfo wordInfo)
        Sets the morpheme information to the node.
        パラメータ:
        wordInfo - the morpheme information
        関連項目:
        WordInfo

      • getPathCost

        int getPathCost()
        Returns the cost of the path from the beginning of sentence to this node.
        戻り値:
        the cost of the path from BOS to this node

      • getWordId

        int getWordId()
        Returns the ID of the morpheme. The IDs change when the dictionaries are updated or the combination of dictionaries changes. If the morpheme is OOV, it returns a negative value.
        戻り値:
        the word ID

      • getDictionaryId

        int getDictionaryId()
        Returns the ID of the dictionary ID containing the morpheme of the node. If the morpheme is OOV, it returns a negative value.
        戻り値:
        the dictionary ID
